com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin.UserController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin/user")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects and object of the User class for admins. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request. For the work used implementation of the interface MainMVFabric.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    User, MainMVFabric, UserService, FileService

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      The implementation of the interface provides a set of standard methods for creates and returns the main modelAndViews for admins.
      private SenderService senderService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with E-mail.
      private UserService userService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the User class.

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addUser(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="login")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String login,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="phone")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String phone,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="vkontakte")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String vkontakte,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="facebook")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String facebook,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="twitter")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String twitter,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="skype")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String skype,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="photo")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String photoUrl,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="is_valid")
                                                                                                                         boolean isValid,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="is_mailing")
                                                                                                                         boolean isMailing,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="is_locked")
                                                                                                                         boolean isLocked,
                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Adds new user and redirects by url /admin/user/{url}. Request mapping: /admin/user/add Method: POST
        Parameters:
        name - a name of the new user.
        login - a login of the new user.
        password - a password of the new user.
        description - a description of the new user.
        phone - a phone of the new user.
        email - a e-mail of the new user.
        vkontakte - a vkontakte url of the new user.
        facebook - a facebook url of the new user.
        twitter - a twitter url of the new user.
        skype - a skype username of the new user.
        photoUrl - a photo URL to the new user.
        isValid - a validated of the new user.
        isMailing - a permit to send a letters on the user email.
        isLocked - locked the user or not.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        User

      • addUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=GET)
public void addUser()
                                                                         throws org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException
        The method throws an exception in the case of reference to it. The exception sender: "GET method in "/admin/user/add" is not supported!" Request mapping: /admin/user/add Method: POST
        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException - thrown when an error occurs reading the mapping between object and datastore.

public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateUser(@RequestParam(value="url")

                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="login")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String login,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="description")

                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="phone")

                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="vkontakte")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String vkontakte,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="facebook")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String facebook,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="twitter")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String twitter,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="skype")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String skype,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="photo")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String photoUrl,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="is_valid")
                                                                                                                               boolean isValid,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="is_mailing")
                                                                                                                               boolean isMailing,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="is_locked")
                                                                                                                               boolean isLocked,
                                                                                                                               org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Updates and save the user with url and redirects by url /admin/user/{url}. Request mapping: /admin/user/update Method: POST
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the user to update.
        name - a new name to the user.
        login - a new login to the user.
        password - a new password to the user.
        description - a new description to the user.
        phone - a new phone to the user.
        email - a new e-mail to the user.
        vkontakte - a new vkontakte url to the user.
        facebook - a new facebook url to the user.
        twitter - a new twitter url to the user.
        skype - a new skype username to the user.
        photoUrl - a photo URL to the user.
        isValid - a validated of the user.
        isMailing - a permit to send a letters on the user email.
        isLocked - locked the user or not.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        User, File

        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException - thrown when an error occurs reading the mapping between object and datastore.
